reference_summary:
PRETTISEST Long Curly Wavy Wig Ombre 28 Inches Body Wave Wigs for Black White Women Replacement Synthetic Body Wave Wig (Color:#1B)
PRETTIEST
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'PRETTIEST', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 8.54 x 2.05 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'UPC': '778862790109'}
Honestly I love this wig <3 shes pretty thick for the price. If you ever see this wig on sale, get it !! I literally took it out of the bag and started using it. Imagine when I style it. I have brushed it and it does shed but not as much as other cheap wigs. Overall this wig is amazing. I wish bought multiple now
Amazing <3
Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Beauty Bakerie
['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
{'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Super pigmented, when dried. It stays put and will go no where. It comes off with regular methods, just alot harder then a oil based remover. I highly recommend for the staying power !!
Will stay put after drying!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys long, wavy, and curly synthetic wigs in modern styles with vibrant colors, demonstrating an expanding interest in costume wigs for thematic events like Halloween. Recently broadened focus to include hair care, seeking products that enhance curl and volume. Additionally interested in skincare essentials, particularly products that cater to sensitive skin, alongside high-quality cosmetics, nail care items, and professional beauty tools.

- **Quality Expectations:** Values good value for price, emphasizing thickness, durability, and effectiveness across all product types. Prefers items that offer long-lasting results with ease of use. While the user appreciates versatile styling products for themed occasions, they maintain high standards for performance.

- **Purchase Behavior:** Purchases are often determined by positive past experiences, yet the user is cautious with new items that may not meet their expectations. They frequently explore a blend of everyday beauty essentials, thematic styling products, and practical items, including those for skincare and nail care.

- **Reviewing Style:** Uses enthusiastic language balanced with constructive feedback, expressing affection for products while candidly addressing any shortcomings. Maintains a positive outlook in their reviews.

- **Trend Awareness:** Actively engages with beauty and skincare trends, remaining proactive about new product launches and deals across various beauty categories.

Overall, the user prioritizes quality, value, aesthetic appeal, and versatility in their beauty regimen, seamlessly incorporating daily care and creative styling elements.
